1.label: Color temperature
1.description: Values range from 0 to 100 where 0 is cold white and 100 is warm white.

2.label: Shock sensor sensitivity
2.description: Range from 0 to 31 where 0 is minimum sensitivity and 31 is maximum sensitivity.

3.label: Strobe Light Interval
3.description: Values range from 0 to 25 in intervals of 100 milliseconds.

4.label: Strobe Light Pulse Count
4.description: Values range from 0 to 250 and a special value 255 which sets infinite flashing.

5.label: Enable or Disable Random Strobe Pulse Colors
5.description: Values range are 0 (turn on) or 1 (turn off).
